value.verse: Though in the form of God, *
value.halfverse: Christ Jesus did not cling to equality with God,
and was born in human likeness.
value.verse: But emptied himself, taking the form of a servant, *

value.halfverse: and became obedient to death, even death on a cross.
value.verse: Being found in human form, he humbled himself *

value.halfverse: and given him the name above every name,
value.verse: Therefore, God has highly exalted him *

value.halfverse: in heaven and on earth and under the earth,
value.verse: That at the name of Jesus, every knee shall bow, *
And every tongue confess that Jesus Christ is Lord, *
value.halfverse: to the glory of God the Father.
